ptxt.intxrefpoff: Radiator On-Vehicle Inspection and Cleaning:For Diesel Engine Model

s1.ptxt: Drain coolant referring to Cooling System Draining:For Diesel Engine Model .
Remove cooling fan assembly referring to Radiator Cooling Fan Assembly Removal and Installation:For Diesel Engine Model .
Remove radiator inlet and outlet hose from radiator.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedures, noting the following.

item.ptxt: Refill cooling system referring to Cooling System Refilling:For Diesel Engine Model .
After installation, verify there is no coolant leakage each connection.
